text:
@GovMurphy r0 is “basic reproduction #”, # of people an infected persons goes on to infect

CDC confirmed Covid19 r0 is 5.7. 

Flu has an r0 of about 1.3.    

5.7^3 = 185……….1.3^3 = 2.2

5.7^6 = 34,296……….1.3^6 = 4.8

5.7^9 = 6,351,461…..…..1.3^9 = 10.6

Highly contagious. #covid19
